borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">The siting and design of the proposed development would result in a harmful of loss of privacy to neighbouring occupiers especially no. 116 Wood Lane, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to: </p><ul><li style="">Paragraph 130(f) of the National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;(DLUHC, July 2021) </li><li style="">Policy D6&nbsp;of the London Plan (March 2021); </li><li style="">Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010) </li><li style="">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011) </li><li style="">The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); </li><li style="">Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>

<p style="">The scale and siting of the proposed outbuilding is considered harmful to the character of the area and plot, closing off open and spacious gardens to the rear of the property,&nbsp;notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. Furthermore, the scale and size of the outbuilding, combined with the side access route from the highway, it cannot be confirmed the outbuilding would have an ancillary function to the main dwellinghouse. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</p><ul><li><span pt="" sans="">Paragraphs&nbsp;126 and 203&nbsp;of the National Planning Policy Framework </span>&nbsp;(DLUHC, July 2021)</li><li><span pt="" sans="" style="line-height:107%">Policies&nbsp;D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (March 2021)</span></li><li><span pt="" sans="">Policies CP2 and CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)</li><li><span pt="" sans="">Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</li><li><span pt="" sans="" style="line-height:107%">The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</span></li><li><span pt="" sans="" style="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of t</span>he London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>
